generators.description: creates a new Spring Boot REST service project
generators.name: NewSpringBootRestService

parameters.name: project_name
parameters.valid_input_description: A valid GitHub repo name containing only alphanumeric, ., -, and _ characters and 21 characters or less to avoid Slack truncating the name when creating a channel for the repo

parameters.name: artifactId
parameters.description: Maven artifact identifier, i.e., the name of the jar without the version, it is often the same as the project name
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid Maven artifact ID, which starts with a lower-case letter and contains only alphanumeric, -, and _ characters

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Maven group identifier, often used to provide a namespace for your project, e.g., com.pany.team
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid Maven group ID, which starts with a letter, -, or _ and contains only alphanumeric, -, and _ characters and may having leading period separated identifiers starting with letters or underscores and containing only alphanumeric and _ characters.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: initial version of the project, e.g., 1.2.3-SNAPSHOT

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: short descriptive text describing the new project

parameters.name: rootPackage
parameters.description: root package for your generated source, often this will be namespaced under the group ID
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid Java package name, which consists of period-separated identifiers which have only alphanumeric characters, $ and _ and do not start with a number

parameters.name: serviceClassName
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid Java class name, which contains only alphanumeric characters, $ and _ and does not start with a number
